about_the_game:
Welcome, New Commander

'Alignment Zero' is a real-time tactical simulation game.
Become a commander, organize a squad of 4 units, and lead them to victory through your own tactics in battle.

Diverse and Unique Characters

Meet various characters with unique personalities, weapons, and skills.
If you succeed in recruiting them, they can become your new units.
Gather characters to create your own company.

Battles Start with Squad Formation

You can deploy a squad of 4 units from your company.
Each unit has unique weapons, stats, skills, and synergies with other units.
Different missions require different formations.
Discover the most optimal combination to complete missions.

Tactical Decisions Every Moment

Battles unfold in real-time.
Neither allies nor enemies, nor flying bullets, wait for you.
Constantly assess the situation, give commands to move to cover, attack, and use skills at the right moment.
Think and execute effective tactics to win battles.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or Higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or Higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on an SSD improves loading times
